ruling: - "When resolving [[Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior]]'s effect, drawing 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster does not start another Chain.
- If [[Peten the Dark Clown]] is sent to the Graveyard by [[Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior]]'s effect, its effect can be activated, even if you draw cards with [[Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior]]'s effect.
- See [[Jain, Lightsworn Paladin]] for additional rulings."
